alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Lawrence County through 630 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kring Point State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogdensburg, Lisbon, Edwardsville, Heuvelton, Hammond, Morristown, Jacques Cartier State Park, Chippewa Bay, South Hammond and North Hammond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
